entries.abort: Mission has been aborted, returning to base.
entries.arrived_at_loc: The freighter will arive soon, prepare to take up escort positions.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pconstrast1 Enemy vessels detected. Systems battle ready! pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < contrast1 Hostile craft eliminated. pcontrast3 >
entries.complete: The freighter has reached it's destination, return for another transport.
entries.duty_update: contrast3 Black Epsilon Command: < pcontrast1 %TO pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: The freighter has been destroyed.  You have failed your mission.
entries.failed_protect: You have failed to protect the freighter.  The mission is aborted.
entries.found_loc: Freighter jump location sent to your nav computer. Proceed as planned.
entries.goodbye_1: Thank you for the escort, I'll be sure to ask for you next time through as well.
entries.goodbye_2: Thank you for the escort, I'll be sure to ask for you next time through as well.
entries.goodbye_3: Thank you for the escort, I'll be sure to ask for you next time through as well.
entries.goodbye_4: Thank you for the escort, I'll be sure to ask for you next time through as well.
entries.goodbye_5: Thank you for the escort, I'll be sure to ask for you next time through as well.
entries.hull_half: Hull integrity is below 50%, please hurry!
entries.panic_1: Pirates!  Do you think they will believe that I don't have any cargo?
entries.panic_2: Hutts! What are they doing around here.
entries.panic_3: Not again. I always get attacked on this run.
entries.panic_4: Oh great, as if my life wasn't hard enough.
entries.panic_5: I hope you know how to fly that thing.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the freighter to it's destination. Keep it protected from any enemy fighter that might try to take it's cargo.
entries.quest_location_d: The freighters will be jumping into Corellia system and need to have their escort meet them. You will be supplied the arrival location of your assigned vessel. Meet the vessel at this location.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: The freighter will not arrive until you are at the arrival location. This is to ensure that they have an escort the entire time they are in Corellian system.
entries.reason_1: Stay alert, this is a known pirate area.
entries.reason_2: Imperial high command really wants my cargo. So please watch my back.
entries.reason_3: Be on the look out. I attract pirates like a garbage attracts womp rats.
entries.reason_4: I feel much safer with you escorting me through this dangerous area.
entries.reason_5: Keep on the alert. Pirates are all over the place.
entries.shields_depleted: Shields are down, if you are going to act do it now!
entries.taunt_1: This will be so easy they might as well deliver the goods to us!
entries.taunt_2: You might as well give up now.
entries.taunt_3: Borvo will be pleased with our prize.
entries.taunt_4: Ok, no more Mr. Nice Guy.
entries.taunt_5: This will only take a second.
entries.thanks: Great job, the Empire sure gets my vote.
entries.thanks_1: Great job, the Empire sure gets my vote.
entries.thanks_2: Great job, the Empire sure gets my vote.
entries.thanks_3: Great job, the Empire sure gets my vote.
entries.thanks_4: Great job, the Empire sure gets my vote.
entries.thanks_5: Great job, the Empire sure gets my vote.
entries.title: Corellia System: Protect Local Shipping Duty
entries.title_d: Due to the inefficency of the CorSec the Empire has decided that it must help freighters in the region get their cargo through without being attacked by pirates. You will be assigned a freighter that you will need to protect from any attempt to capture it.
